mean_cn: v. 免费搭乘他人便车
mean_en: to get a ride in a passing vehicle by holding out your arm with your thumb up as you stand on the side of the road
word_etyma: hitch搭便车 + hike远足 → hitchhike 搭便车旅行
short_phrase: If you hitchhike, use a 'thumbs up'.
sentence: I'm hitchhiking across the country; will anybody pick me up?
sentence_trans: 我现在在搭便车游全国；会有人搭我吗？
